ezvcard.io.xml

Class XCardReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.io.StreamReader
      • ezvcard.io.xml.XCardReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class XCardReader
extends StreamReader

    Reads xCards (XML-encoded vCards) in a streaming fashion.

    Example: 

     Path file = Paths.get("vcards.xml");
 try (XCardReader reader = new XCardReader(file)) {
   VCard vcard;
   while ((vcard = reader.readNext()) != null) {
     //...
   }
 }
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    RFC 6351
